Header: Rapid development of the country amid challenges
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe has pointed out that the government took steps during the last three years to develop the country rapidly amid challenges and difficulties. He emphasized that the country would be made a rich nation by 2025. Launching of the development work from Bibila to Chenkaladi on the Badulla – Chenkalladi road took place under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. The road is developed with a loan grant from Saudi Fund for development. The road from Bibila to Chenkaladi is 87 kilometers long and 9,600 million rupees will be spent on the development activities. The Prime Minister said that constructions of Padiyatalawa – Chenkaladi road were launched under the good governance government and it would develop the tourism industry and the other sectors.
